definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Nobody thought that he had turned out a great inventor.
sentences.chinese: 沒人想到他會變成一位偉大的發明家。

sentences.english: The inventor is exc ITed, and he is going to try out his new machine.
sentences.chinese: 這位發明家很興奮，他要試一下他的新機器。

sentences.english: Goldman was an inventor, but a practical one.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位發明家，但是是一位非常切實際的人。

sentences.english: In my youth my ambition had been to be an inventor.
sentences.chinese: 在我年輕時我的抱負曾是當一名發明家。

sentences.english: Edison is a great inventor whose fame is world-wide.
sentences.chinese: 愛迪生是一位偉大的發明家，他名揚天下。

sentences.english: The young inventor was badly scalded .
sentences.chinese: 這個小發明家也被嚴重地燙傷了。

sentences.english: Did that mean I was meant to be an inventor?
sentences.chinese: 但那就表示我註定要成爲一個發明家嗎？

sentences.english: To these gutty inventor, good luck is omnipresent.
sentences.chinese: 對於這些有勇氣的發明家，機遇無所不在。

sentences.english: The Puffin may never fly, but other inventors are tinkering.
sentences.chinese: 也許海雀還不能飛，但其他的發明家仍在努力。

sentences.english: “You have to be an optimist to be an inventor or entrepreneur, ” he concludes.
sentences.chinese: 要成爲一位發明家或企業家，你必須得是個樂天派。

sentences.english: HOW many inventions does it take to change a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 每當人類變革一次燈泡需要多少位發明家？

sentences.english: An inventor in Tokyo recently came out with a miniature telephone.
sentences.chinese: 東京的一個發明家發明了一款微型電話。

sentences.english: What do you mean, win the breakup old-timey inventor?
sentences.chinese: 什麼意思，分手贏家？你這個古典發明家。

sentences.english: Unit 15 How Did Edison Become a Great Inventor?
sentences.chinese: 愛迪生緣何成爲大發明家？

sentences.english: The young inventor wbritish petroleumostlyly scingded.
sentences.chinese: 這個小發明家也被要緊地燙傷了。

sentences.english: Historically, many scientists and inventors have taken full advantage of daydreaming. Many scientists and inventors in history took full use of daydreaming.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上許多科學家與發明家曾充分利用白日夢。

spiritual leader (of a nation or church)/religious leader
